text: ral atrophy - Chilblain lesions - Chronic CSF lymphocytosis - Deep white matter hypodensities - Dystonia - Elevated hepatic transaminases - Feeding difficulties in infancy - Fever - Hepatosplenomegaly - Increased CSF interferon alpha - Intellectual disability, profound - Leukoencephalopathy - Morphological abnormality of the pyramidal tract - Multiple gastric polyps - Muscular hypotonia of the trunk - Nystagmus - Petechiae - Poor head control - Progressive encephalopathy - Progressive microcepha
